# gameOfLife
Implementation of the Game of Life in different languages for fun

Receives the amount of executions, lenght of the board as an input (x and y), and the value of each cell in a string of 0s and 1s

python main.py 1000 4 4 0001001100110001
python main.py 1000 4 4 0000000001110000
python main.py 1000 10 10 0001110000000000000000000000000100000100010000010001000001000000000000000000000011100011100000000000


python main.py 1000000 100 100 

1 Millon Executions
Language | 4x4 | 10x10 | 62x62 | 100x100 | 1000x1000 
Python   |  8  |  50   |       |   4323  |  




# Crear un tablero de 100x100 lleno de ceros
board_size = 100
board = [[0 for _ in range(board_size)] for _ in range(board_size)]

# Pistola de planeadores de Gosper usando 1 y 0
gosper_glider_gun = [
    "000000000000000000000000100000000000",
    "000000000000000000000010100000000000",
    "000000000000110000001100000000000011",
    "000000000001000100001100000000000011",
    "110000000010000010001100000000000000",
    "110000000010001011000010100000000000",
    "000000000010000010000000100000000000",
    "000000000001000100000000000000000000",
    "000000000000110000000000000000000000"
]

# Convertir a matriz de 1 y 0
gosper_glider_gun = [[int(cell) for cell in row] for row in gosper_glider_gun]

# Insertar la pistola de planeadores en el tablero de 100x100 en una posición específica
start_row, start_col = 1, 1  # Puedes cambiar la posición de inicio según sea necesario

for i in range(len(gosper_glider_gun)):
    for j in range(len(gosper_glider_gun[i])):
        board[start_row + i][start_col + j] = gosper_glider_gun[i][j]

# Función para imprimir el tablero

def print_board(board):
    a = ""
    for row in board:
        a = a + "".join(str(cell) for cell in row)
    print(a)

# Imprimir el tablero
print_board(board)
